trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that specifies authentication settings for a service certificate.
trans-unit.target: 表示組態項目，指定服務憑證的驗證設定。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509ServiceCertificateAuthenticationElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509ServiceCertificateAuthenticationElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the certificate validation mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定憑證驗證模式。

trans-unit.source: The certificate validation mode.
trans-unit.target: 憑證驗證模式。

trans-unit.source: Copies the content of the specified configuration element to this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的組態項目的內容複製到這個組態項目。

trans-unit.source: The configuration element to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的組態元素。

trans-unit.source: from is .
trans-unit.target: fromis .

trans-unit.source: The configuration file is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 組態檔為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of custom service certificate validator to be used.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要使用的自訂服務憑證驗證程式的型別。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] provides a default service certificate validator that verifies the service certificate against the trusted people store.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]提供驗證服務憑證，針對受信任的人存放區的預設服務憑證驗證程式。

trans-unit.source: It also verifies that the certificate chains up to a valid root.
trans-unit.target: 它也會驗證憑證鏈結直到有效根。

trans-unit.source: You can implement a custom validator to specify a different behavior and use this property to point to the custom validator.
trans-unit.target: 您可以實作自訂驗證程式指定不同的行為，並使用這個屬性指向自訂的驗證程式。

trans-unit.source: The type of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator"></xref> to be used.
trans-unit.target: 型別<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator"></xref>使用。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the certificate revocation mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定憑證撤銷模式。

trans-unit.source: The system verifies that the service certificate has not been revoked by looking it up in the revoked certificate list.
trans-unit.target: 系統會驗證的服務憑證尚未被撤銷的查閱撤銷的憑證清單中。

trans-unit.source: This check can be performed either by checking online or against a cached revocation list.
trans-unit.target: 藉由線上檢查或是針對快取的撤銷清單，可以執行這項檢查。

trans-unit.source: Revocation checking can be turned off by setting this property to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode>.
trans-unit.target: 撤銷檢查可以關閉這個屬性設定為<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode>

trans-unit.source: The certificate revocation mode.
trans-unit.target: 憑證撤銷模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the trusted store location where the service certificate is validated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要驗證其中服務憑證的受信任存放區位置。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] security system validates the service certificate against a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]安全性系統會驗證服務憑證，針對<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>

trans-unit.source: The store location is specified using this property.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性指定的存放區位置。

trans-unit.source: The trusted store location where the service certificate is validated.
trans-unit.target: 驗證其中服務憑證的受信任存放區位置。
